title: One Bedroom One Bath Available 8/10/2022
posting_body: Greetings,
We appreciate your interest in Tides on Twain.
We have 3 amazing floor plans to choose from, based on your needs.
Our prices are guaranteed to be the lowest in the area with affordable application and administration fees.
Tides on Twain offers prices starting at $1,339 a month (WATER TRASH AND SEWER NOT INCLUDED)
Security deposits are as low as $150.00 OAC.
Our pet-friendly community allows your furry friends to join you in your new home (breed restrictions apply).
Our community offers a fully equipped gym with a sauna, a pet-friendly station, two sparkling pools, and a playground as our amenities.
All our amenities have been renovated and we added additional BBQ pits.
Our 24-hour onsite maintenance team will provide you with the best service to their knowledge.
Tides on Twain living is conveniently located near many neighborhood gems such as major shopping centers and restaurants.
What are you waiting for?
Contact us today and become part of the Tides on Twain community.
** Bilingual Staff in the office
To schedule a viewing that best fits your schedule, please contact our leasing office at
show contact info

We look forward to hearing from you soon.
